name: The Awesome Bib- Urban Zoologie Owls (Boys)
description:
The Awesome Bib is a double layer dribble bib that keeps your little one's skin dry, and dribble free all day. 

They are perfect for protecting your baby's skin from dribble rash, eczema, and are an essential purchase for infants with reflux.

Our bibs are 100% Cotton with a a choice of two types of backing. The first one is Micro Chenille which is as soft as your baby's bottom. The other is a Cotton Waffle which is thinner, lighter, and perfect for those hot summer days. 

They are machine washable, dryer safe and the colours are long lasting.

These bibs are so AWESOME, they are not only practical, but the ultimate fashion accessory! And, they fit most kids up to two-three years of age.
